attributes.action: confine mandatory security checks at airports to risk targets and risk based limited selection amongst the general population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to recent figures there are 2,000 people on the terror watch list in the UK yet there are 82 million air passengers (1999. Parliamentary Office of Science and Technology). Despite this ALL passenegers are subject to delays and restrictions to avoid offending indentified risk sections of the population

Metal detection, passive sniffing technology and profiling are sufficiently advanced to return security to it's former discreet levels without increasing risk

The searching of children and the elderly in non-risk and family groups is particularly distressing 

Those who find they are on the 'watch list' should be given a right of legal challenge 'in camera' to avoid confusion over mistaken identity
